Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Class player must place a black disc on the board, in such a way that there is at least one straight (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) occupied line between the new disc and another disc that belong to the player with one or more contiguous opponent pieces between them.
    Since:
    2020-04-05

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game()
      We set the default board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        We set the default board. Creating 8x8 board with the Block Class. setting the 4 start nut in the center of the board.

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(int row,
                        char column)
        It check if it is possible to make the move and if it was It will Call the nextMove method to make the move.
        Parameters:
        row - the row field
        column - the column field
        Returns:
        if it is possible to make the move it will return true.

      • checkMoves

        public boolean checkMoves()
        It checks if player can make any moves or not. if they can't then their turn will pass.
        Returns:
        if there isn't any move for the player to make it will return false
